blog.name: ao3feed-bakudeku
blog.title: ao3feed-BakuDeku
blog.description:
Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

title: Word Vomit
description:
by Squoosestiel

Bakugo Katsuki was many things, but one thing he was not was someone who had a verbal filter. Most people know this and don’t think much of the snarky things he says.

Sure, not thinking before he spoke has led to some issues, mainly arguments with his mother, but they’ve never been this bad. They’ve never left someone in tears before. He’s also never seen Deku cry like this. He’s never seen Deku cry so hard he couldn’t support his own body weight.

Words: 557, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: Gen, M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Midoriya Izuku, Kirishima Eijirou, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, Yagi Toshinori | All Might
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead & Bakugou Katsuki, Bakugou Katsuki & Kirishima Eijirou, Midoriya Izuku & Yagi Toshinori | All Might
  • Additional Tags: POV Third Person, Endgame Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku, Internalized Homophobia, Happy Ending, Bakugou Katsuki is Bad at Feelings, Minor Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead/Yamada Hizashi | Present Mic, Married Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead/Yamada Hizashi | Present Mic, self discovery, Slow Burn

blog.name: faketextsfromlastmight
blog.title: Fake texts from last Might
blog.description: Things BNHA characters most definitely never said (sadly).

summary: Midnight : Bakugou, I'm not going to let you pick "Lord Explosion Murder" as your hero name. You're not a murderer, so it's...
body:
Midnight : Bakugou, I'm not going to let you pick "Lord Explosion Murder" as your hero name. You're not a murderer, so it's tacky. We need a name which feels more authentically you. Highlight aspects of your personality people don't know about... Like your kindness, or your sensibility. I would recommend something a) more linked to your personal history, and b) very unthreatening.
Midoriya Izuku : [butting in] Midnight is right... "Kacchan".
Bakugou Katsuki : ...Oh god no.
Midnight : OH GOD YES!!!

dialogue.name: Midnight
dialogue.label: Midnight :
dialogue.phrase: Bakugou, I'm not going to let you pick "Lord Explosion Murder" as your hero name. You're not a murderer, so it's tacky. We need a name which feels more authentically you. Highlight aspects of your personality people don't know about... Like your kindness, or your sensibility. I would recommend something a) more linked to your personal history, and b) very unthreatening.

Then go check out my Patreon (see website link, or type in "Fumeiyo" on Patreon)! ALSO, full disclosure: Shinsou is my baby, so I apologize in advance for blatantly showing favoritism.

title: ~ *BNHA ZODIACS* ~
body:
YET AGAIN-

-Another thing nobody requested but that I banged out in the wee hours of the morning on straight impulse. Either way, I hope you sinners like it! So without further ado… ﾍ(=￣∇￣)ﾉ

• BNHA ZODIACS: Because Why the Fuck Not ™ • 

Capricorn (December 22nd - January 19th)

Notable traits: practical, careful, pessimistic, stingy

  • Todoroki (January 11th)
  • Hawks

Aquarius (January 20th - February 18th)

Notable traits: loyal, independent, unpredictable, intractable

  • Shoji (February 15th)

Pisces (February 19th - March 20th)

Notable traits: sensitive, selfless, weak-willed, secretive

  • Amajiki (March 4th)

Aries (March 21st - April 19th)

Notable traits: competitive, ambitious, impulsive, impatient

  • Shigaraki (April 4th)

Taurus (April 20th - May 20th)

Notable traits: reliable, determined, resentful, greedy

  • Bakugo (April 20th)
  • Monoma (May 13th)
  • Shindo (May 13th)

Gemini (May 21st - June 20th)

Notable traits: adaptable, witty, tense, inconsistent

  • Ojiro (May 28th)
  • Overhaul (May 28th)
  • All Might (June 10th)

Cancer (June 21st - July 22nd)

Notable traits: intuitive, sympathetic, moody, clingy

  • Kaminari (June 29th)
  • Shinsou (July 1st)
  • Present Mic (July 7th)
  • Midoriya (July 15th)
  • Mirio (July 15th)

Leo (July 23rd - August 22nd)

Notable traits: generous, open-minded, bossy, patronizing

  • Sero (July 28th)
  • Fat Gum (August 8th)
  • Iida (August 22nd)

Virgo (August 23rd - September 22nd)

Notable traits: reliable, practical, fussy, overcritical

  • Power Loader (September 17th)
  • Mama Smutsy ( ;_; )

Libra (September 23rd - October 22nd)

Notable traits: easygoing, charming, indecisive, gullible

  • Yoarashi (September 26th)
  • Kirishima (October 16th)
  • Tetsutetsu (October 16th)

Scorpio (October 23rd - November 21st)

Notable traits: determined, intuitive, resentful, obstinate

  • Tokoyami (October 30th)
  • Aizawa (November 8th)

Sagittarius (November 22nd - December 21st)

Notable traits: optimistic, honest, tactless, careless

  • David Shield (December 1st)

Yeah we got JACK DIDDLY for Virgo and Sagittarius rn, I will update this post if we get some more male characters in the series though, so maybe then then Virgo and Sagittarius zodiacs can get some more rep. 

UPDATE: (FIXED) ALL MIGHT’S BIRTHDAY IS JUNE 10TH - THANK YOU SWEETHEART IN THE COMMENT BOX!

              <<<NSFW Goodness Below the Cut  >>>

OTHERWISE: I hope you enjoyed love doves! Sorry, again, that this is so random, I am actually working your requests, I swear on my life. I just get side-tracked with spontaneous side-projects sometimes… (๑꒪▿꒪)*

You munchkins have a wonderful day!

     xoxo,
          Smutsy  (“⌒∇⌒”)

• NSFW BNHA ZODIACS •

Capricorn: Sex = Procedure

  • Planned. METHODICAL, even.
  • Runs like a machine.
  • Likes to take their time and make it memorable.
  • Not super experimental.
  • Quick recharge to go again.

Aquarius: Sex = Unpredictable

  • This shit ain’t simple.
  • Sex is RESEARCH. They get to know partner through sex.
  • Souls must be exposed.
  • Philosophical about everything.
  • Experimenting? Yes please.

Pisces: Sex = Sensitive

  • Sensitive and considerate.
  • Giver. Likes to give.
  • Overwhelmingly pleasant, and moving.
  • Not a tease or a flirt, but will give in to your teasing and flirting.
  • Can forget to take care of themselves during sex, those silly geese.

Aries: Sex = Conquest

  • When it’s time to fuck it’s time to FUCK.
  • Hella direct.
  • Likes taking the initiative.
  • I came, I saw, I conquered?
  • You mean I saw, I made you come, I came, and I conquered.

Taurus: Sex = Effort

  • PUT YOUR BACK INTO IT.
  • Works hard to make it enjoyable.
  • And expects you to work hard too.
  • A quickie, what the fuck is that?
  • Committed as heck, and you better be too.

Gemini: Sex = Fun

  • Sex is fun! It’s like the game of love!
  • Iz just game, why you have to be mad?
  • Emphasis on foreplay, and then swift sexy times.
  • A tease, and a skilled seducer.
  • Likes to shake things up sometimes, with limited warning.

Cancer: Sex = Intimacy

  • This shit is sacred.
  • Fervent love-making.
  • Likes to be in charge.
  • When they are horny they are HORNY.
  • HUNGRY LIKE THE WOLF, and the partner has to be willing to give it all to feed that it.

Leo: Sex = Attention

  • Not a hard person to please, they just need attention.
  • GIVE ME ATTENTION PLEASE. I NEED LOVE.
  • Satisfying to satisfy.
  • Quick to seduce, and lustful when they are.
  • Needs to be praised (head pats, maybe?).

Virgo: Sex = Perfection

  • THIS SHIT IS COMPLICATED. IT HAS TO BE PERFECT.
  • Precise, and tactical.
  • Has to be stroked just the right way to get their motor running.
  • Emphasis on commitment.
  • Doesn’t improvise much, but sticks with what’s good and perfects it. Freaking PERFECTS it.

Libra: Sex = Sharing

  • Balance, my dude.
  • Equal on both sides.
  • Emphasis on closeness, almost to the point of being a little clingy.
  • I mean, sex is spiritual, yo.
  • Are rarely spontaneous, but not incapable of it.

Scorpio: Sex = Emotion

  • Sensual AS FUCK.
  • Did someone order a shit ton of intense emotion?
  • Kind of have these passion explosions when it’s time to get NASTY.
  • Tends to have an exciting sex life.
  • Is gladly kinky.

Sagittarius: Sex = Impulse

  • Is difficuly to seduce.
  • Sex might be quick, but it is intense.
  • There has to be longing, or its just a chore.
  • Tend to be charming motherfuckers.
  • Acts like they don’t want it, just to be a little shit.

Hope you enjoyed, my sweet little sinners! ∠( ᐛ 」∠)＿ Mama loves you! 

     xoxo,
          Smutsy

blog.name: cheeky-kitsune
blog.title: Organised Chaos
blog.description:
🦊 22 🦊 She/Her 🦊 Constant Taishiro Hoe.🦊
Hey kits, welcome to my little nest of smut, grab a seat, get a hot drink and enjoy while I post my adult fics.
Askbox: Closed.
Everything I write has the characters aged up past 18!!!
Endeavor/Mineta/Sero/Iida/Izuku/Pro heroes (except fatgum) free zone!!!

title: Indulgence - Mirio X Reader
body:
Hey guys, so, I was distracted from playing my game and instead, I started writing a quick, fuck around, scenario in a notebook. Showed it to a friend, they enjoyed it, I finished it and now it’s here.

I hope you enjoy this little scenario and please, don’t forget to send in your reactions, or leave a little comment below - Yes, I do see them.

Anywho, here you go!

🦊💋


 Your back arched as a soft gasp spilled from your lips, Mirio’s warm touch sending welcomed shivers down your spine. The way his hands moved over your bare flesh was unfair, just the lightest of touches would have you squirming beneath him.

 Completely at his mercy.

 “Enjoying that babe? You like it when I touch you like that?”

 You could only manage a quiet hum in response, confirming what he had already figured out from watching you beneath him.

 “I’m glad (Name). You’re too tense lately…you should let me treat you like this more often” Mirio remarked, his ministrations growing rougher as the seconds passed, causing a low groan of muffled bliss to escape you. Your head dropping into the pillows below.

 “Mirio, are you trying to ruin all men for me?” You questioned, unable to sound even the slightest bit annoyed with him while his hands continued to work their magic on your all too vulnerable form.

 “If I said yes, would you be mad? You are mine after all.” Mirio mused, a smile beginning to tug on the edge of his lips as you looked towards him through a lidded gaze, your mind hazy from the feeling he was spreading throughout your body.

 “Never took you for the jealous type” You mumbled, dropping your head back down to the pillows once more, sinking into their soft, welcoming embrace while Mirio’s fingers moved with more strength, pulling noises from you that you hadn’t even realized you could make.

 “I’m not jealous (Name), I can do things to you that no one else can” Mirio hummed, his voice dripping like honey as his hands moved higher along your body, sliding along the dips and curves of your body, stopping only when Mirio moved so that he was above you properly, staring down at you with unknown intent.

 “Mm, I know…but you stopped”

 Mirio couldn’t help but chuckle at the way your features twisted into a frown, leaning down and placing a tender kiss upon your head, lingering for a few seconds as he always did, his lips warm against your cool skin.

 “Did I? Hm, guess you’re right.” He smiled, winking at you before lifting himself from the bed, catching your foot before you could land a kick.

 His hands moved slowly, sliding up from your foot, along your leg as he lifted it, beginning to trail kisses along your inner thigh, a mischievous smile decorating his lips at the way your face flushed in embarrassment.

 “You could always ask for another massage (Name), I won’t bite…” Mirio trailed off, nipping at your thigh before lowering your leg towards the bed and stepping away from you, making his way towards the bedroom door at a leisurely pace.

 “For now, I’m going to go make some pancakes, interested?”

 “Mm, I know…but you stopped”

 Mirio couldn’t help but chuckle at the way your features twisted into a frown, leaning down and placing a tender kiss upon your head, lingering for a few seconds as he always did, his lips warm against your cool skin.

 “Did I? Hm, guess you’re right.” He smiled, winking at you before lifting himself from the bed, catching your foot before you could land a kick.

 His hands moved slowly, sliding up from your foot, along your leg as he lifted it, beginning to trail kisses along your inner thigh, a mischievous smile decorating his lips at the way your face flushed in embarrassment.

 “You could always ask for another massage (Name), I won’t bite…” Mirio trailed off, nipping at your thigh before lowering your leg towards the bed and stepping away from you, making his way towards the bedroom door at a leisurely pace.

 “For now, I’m going to go make some pancakes, interested?”
trail.content:
Hey guys, so, I was distracted from playing my game and instead, I started writing a quick, fuck around, scenario in a notebook. Showed it to a friend, they enjoyed it, I finished it and now it’s here.

I hope you enjoy this little scenario and please, don’t forget to send in your reactions, or leave a little comment below - Yes, I do see them.

Anywho, here you go!

🦊💋


 Your back arched as a soft gasp spilled from your lips, Mirio’s warm touch sending welcomed shivers down your spine. The way his hands moved over your bare flesh was unfair, just the lightest of touches would have you squirming beneath him.

 Completely at his mercy.

 “Enjoying that babe? You like it when I touch you like that?”

 You could only manage a quiet hum in response, confirming what he had already figured out from watching you beneath him.

 “I’m glad (Name). You’re too tense lately…you should let me treat you like this more often” Mirio remarked, his ministrations growing rougher as the seconds passed, causing a low groan of muffled bliss to escape you. Your head dropping into the pillows below.

 “Mirio, are you trying to ruin all men for me?” You questioned, unable to sound even the slightest bit annoyed with him while his hands continued to work their magic on your all too vulnerable form.

 “If I said yes, would you be mad? You are mine after all.” Mirio mused, a smile beginning to tug on the edge of his lips as you looked towards him through a lidded gaze, your mind hazy from the feeling he was spreading throughout your body.

 “Never took you for the jealous type” You mumbled, dropping your head back down to the pillows once more, sinking into their soft, welcoming embrace while Mirio’s fingers moved with more strength, pulling noises from you that you hadn’t even realized you could make.

 “I’m not jealous (Name), I can do things to you that no one else can” Mirio hummed, his voice dripping like honey as his hands moved higher along your body, sliding along the dips and curves of your body, stopping only when Mirio moved so that he was above you properly, staring down at you with unknown intent.

 “Mm, I know…but you stopped”

 Mirio couldn’t help but chuckle at the way your features twisted into a frown, leaning down and placing a tender kiss upon your head, lingering for a few seconds as he always did, his lips warm against your cool skin.

 “Did I? Hm, guess you’re right.” He smiled, winking at you before lifting himself from the bed, catching your foot before you could land a kick.

 His hands moved slowly, sliding up from your foot, along your leg as he lifted it, beginning to trail kisses along your inner thigh, a mischievous smile decorating his lips at the way your face flushed in embarrassment.

 “You could always ask for another massage (Name), I won’t bite…” Mirio trailed off, nipping at your thigh before lowering your leg towards the bed and stepping away from you, making his way towards the bedroom door at a leisurely pace.

 “For now, I’m going to go make some pancakes, interested?”

I hope you enjoy this little scenario and please, don’t forget to send in your reactions, or leave a little comment below - Yes, I do see them.

summary: Part 2 of my Tododeku merman au!  (Check out my tag merman au on my blog to find part 1!! Tumblr isn’t letting me link to it) ...
caption:
Part 2 of my Tododeku merman au! 

(Check out my tag merman au on my blog to find part 1!! Tumblr isn’t letting me link to it)

After Izuku was saved (and kissed) he was very confused and had no idea what to do, but Shouto told him to go and see a human doctor to be checked out to see if he was alright. Still very confused he did what he was told, in complete shock. He returned to the beach the next day thinking he might’ve dreamed it all, but there the merman, Shouto, was. Shocked and completely ecstatic to see a real life merman! They talked for so long only to come to this! Legs!

(I did finally finish it before the end of Mermay!!! And my first comic ever >v< Also click the pic for better quality! uvu )

body:
